text:
5 top news from the world of technology over the past week
03 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Daria Gromova
From the new AirPods to the law on the isolation of the Runet and the extremely unpleasant Android virus.
Compared to the previous week, this turned out to be much more diverse for news and announcements of technology. Briefly talk about the most important and interesting.
Apple introduced the AirPods Pro headphones



When no one really expected, Apple unexpectedly announced the TWS-earphones AirPods Pro. They differ from the previous generation in design (vacuum instead of plugs) and active noise reduction technology. Changes in the design of the Internet perceived ambiguously.

More about headphones ‚Üí


Read more about memes about headphones ‚Üí

An undeletable virus appeared on Android. It remains even after a complete reset



The undeletable virus called xHelper, which first became known in March, again made itself felt. Security experts clearly underestimated it: more than 45,000 devices have already been infected, with the vast majority from the United States, India and Russia.

Read more ‚Üí

Foldable Motorola RAZR smartphone shown in the photo. It is very similar to the original from the 2000s



On Slashleaks, many photos of the revived clamshell from the 2000s Motorola RAZR appeared. In expanded form, it is a full-fledged smartphone with a large elongated display. On the cover there is an additional display for widgets and notifications. Price and most features are also known.

Read more ‚Üí

Official: Google buys Fitbit



Google has announced the acquisition of Fitbit, a manufacturer of sports devices and accessories. For Google, this is a great opportunity to continue to develop their Wear OS platform. The deal amounted to more than $ 2 billion.

Read more ‚Üí

In Russia, the law on autonomous Runet entered into force



On November 1, a law on an autonomous Runet entered into force in Russia. So far, the equipment for its execution is only being tested and not installed on networks.

Read more ‚Üí


What is the law and what does it threaten you ‚Üí
